lead_paragraph: In the first part of the last story of the trilogy, the characters are no longer in the gated community of Chicago, but in the world of commerce and big business, devoid of factions and comprised of only two groups: the "genetically pure" and the "genetically damaged." Only GPs can be scientists and researchers, which the GDs claim they are totally accepting of...until they aren't.
